lyrics:
8 contributorsblack widow lyricsverse 1
standing there with your red coat on
french perfume lookin vulnerable
black widow girl you sit and wait
til i climb into the web you made

prechorus
im an animal you got me losing control
you got me losing control you got me losing control
its not right

chorus
i cant take it no more girl
i cant take this abuse
every time that you walk in the room girl
im hypnotized by the way that you move
its the way that you move

verse 2
you call me out at your beck and call
set me up just to watch me fall
twist and turn bend and sway
i move in then you push away

prechorus
im an animal you got me losing control
you got me losing control you got me losing control
its not right
see cage the elephant liveget tickets as low as 399you might also likechorus
i cant take it no more girl
i cant take this abuse
every time that you walk in the room girl
im hypnotized by the way that you move
its the way that you move

instrumental break

chorus
i cant take it no more no more girl
i cant take this abuse
every time that you walk in the room the room
im hypnotized by the way that you move

outro
i cant tell you the future
i may promise the moon
cause every time that you walk in the room girl
im hypnotized by the way that you move
its the way that you move
its the way that you move2embed
